record.title: RECESS UNTIL MONDAY, SEPTEMBER 22, 2008, AT 3 P.M.
record.narrative:
RECESS UNTIL MONDAY, SEPTEMBER 22, 2008, AT 3 P.M. -- (Senate - September 18, 2008)

[Page: S9168]

speaking.paragraph: If there is no further business to come before the Senate, I ask unanimous consent it stand in recess under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 8:49 p.m., recessed until Monday, September 22, 2008, at 3 p.m.
